verses.verse: But him that is weak <S%G770><s%> in faith <S%G4102><s%> receive <S%G4355><s%> ye <S%G3361><s%>, yet not for <S%G1519><s%> decision <S%G1253><s%> of scruples <S%G1261><s%>.

Let <S%G987><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> good <S%G18><s%> be evil spoken of <S%G987><s%>:
